name: Windows XP & LimeWire Simulator Pro v2.7
description: The definitive 2005 Nostalgia Simulator. v2.7 Stability Suite: Comprehensive validation of all 30+ modules. Adds 'System Health' monitor to msinfo32, standardized touch-dragging across all legacy and new windows, and fixed taskbar label inconsistencies for HyperCam and Disk Cleanup.
